title: MILK MAKEUP Micellar Water Makeup Remover Wipes
features: Infused with Chamomile, Green Tea, Coconut, Cucumber, Papaya, and Aloa Vera
description: A pack of 20 biodegradable makeup remover wipes with non-ionic micellar action for effective cleansing. Gently cleanse away face and eye makeup on the go with Micellar Water Makeup Remover Wipes. These portable single wipes cleanse the skin using micellar action to entrap and lift impurities from the skin, sweeping away makeup and debris. Their infusion of chamomile, green tea, coconut, cucumber, papaya, and aloe vera extracts calms the skin. This set contains: - 20 x Biodegradable wipes It is formulated Without: - Parabens - Sulfates - Phthalates The world is giving rise to a new breed of empowered, ambitious, entrepreneurial girls. Milk Makeup girls live life to the fullest and are constantly experiencing, creating and sharing. Milk is a response to their craving for products that facilitate a fast-paced, adventurous lifestyle. Each of the purposely designed, 85 products of the collection acknowledge her need for on-the-go, multi-benefit essentials that give her the freedom to change her look from day to night in five minutes. Milk Makeup is eco-conscious and innovative. The comprehensive product line spanning eye, face, lip, and hair is made of the highest quality ingredients. It features luxurious natural oils, coated powders with natural fruit and vegetable butters, and formulations with minimal to no preservatives. Every product has unique componentry for quick and easy application, so you can spend more time getting stuff done and less time getting done up. Multiple packaging or parts have been eliminated when possible, making one-hand application doable. All formulas require no additional brushes or applicators, unless you prefer that; everything is blendable with your fingertips or the component itself.
